game_description: Meta Rider is a space experience where you fly on your hoverbike through different space environments. Try and find the base before your crew leaves you behind and remember fuel is limited!
review_1: Made for Biden! I got this thinking my girlfriend would like it because she thinks driving pretend motorcycles through the space like a retard with no sense of balance makes me think it would be cool?!?!? go Brandon!..omg this is sooooooooo made for Biden fans
